product_name: Milltop™ Salt & Pepper Mill Set
breadcrumb: Home > Home & Furniture > Kitchenware > Kitchen Utensils
product_description: Enjoy mess-free seasoning with these Milltop™ salt and pepper mills by Joseph Joseph. Their sleek design features a unique top-grind mechanism that eliminates spills, keeping your countertop clean. You can adjust the coarseness with a simple turn of the stainless steel top.
care_instructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth

product_name: Square Neck Mini Waisted Dress
breadcrumb: Home > Women > Dresses > Mini Dresses
product_description: This mini dress is a versatile addition to your wardrobe. It's designed in a regular fit, with a waisted silhouette that flatters your figure. A square neckline and slim shoulder straps create an elegant look. Added stretch in the fabric makes it extra comfy to wear, while a zip fastening at the back ensures a neat finish. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.
material_composition: Composition 88% polyester, 12% elastane (exclusive of trimmings) , Interlining - 100% polyester
care_instructions: Wash at 30°C Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Iron at low temperature Professional dry clean

product_name: Cotton Rich Drawstring Wide Leg Joggers
breadcrumb: Home > Women > Trousers > Joggers
product_description:
On off-duty days, feel comfy and warm in these stylish cotton-rich joggers. They feature flattering wide legs and a mid-rise waist. An internal drawstring helps you find the perfect fit, while brushed-back fabric makes them all cosy inside. 
 
 M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.
care_instructions: Wash at 40°C delicate Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Iron at medium temperature Do not dry clean

A snug roll neck adds warmth, while seam detailing on the front provides extra style points.
care_instructions: Do not wash Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Do not iron Professional dry clean
